price: 16. Waxay (Rusushii) yidhaahdeen: Rabbigayo waa Og yahay inaan nahay Rusul xaggiinna loo soo diray.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
